knitting the first stitch of round 1 and sliding it onto the previous needle if using a stitch marker to mark the bor remove the marker knit the stitch and then place the marker what was the second stitch of the round is now the first stitch chart b foot lace pattern 56-stitch sock chart c foot lace pattern 64-stitch sock chart d foot lace pattern 72-stitch sock simple spiral socks |
